languages.text: Слухи и истории о {mf|его|ее} человеколюбивом правлении заложили основу философской школы валантийцев. Cекта, объединявшая простолюдинов и аристократов, верила, что для достижения процветания Империум должен перестать видеть в своих подданных лишь инструмент. Эта опасная ересь была осуждена во множестве систем, но гонения лишь закаляли и умножали ее сторонников.

Rumours and stories of {mf|his|her} humanitarian rule formed the foundation of the Valancean school of philosophy. The sect united commoners and aristocrats in the belief that for the Imperium to flourish, it should stop seeing its subjects as mere tools. This dangerous heresy was denounced in many systems, but persecutions only hardened and multiplied its followers.
languages.original_text: Слухи и истории о {mf|его|ее} человеколюбивом правлении заложили основу философской школы валантийцев. Эта опасная ересь была осуждена во множестве систем, но гонения лишь закаляли и умножали ее сторонников.

traits.locale_text: Rumors and stories of {mf|his|her} humanitarian rule became the foundation for the philosophical school of Valanceans. This sect united commoners and aristocrats who believed that for the Imperium to flourish, it should stop seeing its subjects as mere tools. This dangerous heresy was denounced in many systems, but persecutions only toughened and multiplied its followers.

This dangerous heresy was denounced in many systems, but persecutions only toughened and multiplied its followers.

Rumours and stories of {mf|his|her} humanitarian rule formed the foundation of the Valancean school of philosophy. The sect united commoners and aristocrats in the belief that for the Imperium to flourish, it should stop seeing its subjects as mere tools. This dangerous heresy was denounced in many systems, but persecutions only hardened and multiplied its followers.

languages.text: 关于{mf|他|她}人道主义统治的传言和故事，成为了瓦兰西亚学派的哲学理论基础。这个学派将平民与贵族联合在一起，他们相信，为了帝国的繁荣，不应该仅仅把臣民视为工具。这种危险的异端思想在许多星系中遭受谴责，但这样的迫害却为学派吸引了更多追随者，让他们的信念变得更加坚定。
languages.original_text: Rumours and stories of {mf|his|her} humanitarian rule formed the foundation of the Valancean school of philosophy. The sect united commoners and aristocrats in the belief that for the Imperium to flourish, it should stop seeing its subjects as mere tools. This dangerous heresy was denounced in many systems, but persecutions only hardened and multiplied its followers.

traits.locale_text: 关于{mf|他|她}人道主义统治的传言和故事，成为了瓦兰西亚学派的哲学理论基础。这个学派将平民与贵族联合在一起，他们相信，为了帝国的繁荣，不应该仅仅把臣民视为工具。这种危险的异端思想在许多星系中遭受谴责，但这样的迫害却为学派吸引了更多追随者，让他们的信念变得更加坚定。

languages.text: Gerüchte und Geschichten über {mf|seine|ihre} humanitäre Herrschaft bildeten die Basis für die Gründung der Valancischen Schule der Philosophie. Die Sekte einte Angehörige des Pöbels und des Adels in dem Glauben, dass das Imperium nur florieren konnte, wenn es seine Untertanen nicht mehr nur als bloße Werkzeuge ansah. Diese gefährliche Ketzerei wurde in vielen Systemen scharf kritisiert, doch durch die Verfolgungen wurden die bestehenden Anhänger nur noch entschlossener und neue kamen dazu.
languages.original_text: Rumours and stories of {mf|his|her} humanitarian rule formed the foundation of the Valancean school of philosophy. The sect united commoners and aristocrats in the belief that for the Imperium to flourish, it should stop seeing its subjects as mere tools. This dangerous heresy was denounced in many systems, but persecutions only hardened and multiplied its followers.

Die Sekte einte Angehörige des Pöbels und des Adels in dem Glauben, dass das Imperium nur florieren konnte, wenn es seine Untertanen nicht mehr nur als bloße Werkzeuge ansah. Diese gefährliche Ketzerei wurde in vielen Systemen scharf kritisiert, doch durch die Verfolgungen wurden die bestehenden Anhänger nur noch entschlossener und neue kamen dazu.

languages.text: Les rumeurs et les histoires concernant son règne humaniste donnèrent naissance à l'école valancéenne de philosophie. La secte unit roturiers et aristocrates, tous convaincus que la prospérité de l'Imperium reposait sur une vision moins utilitaire de ses sujets. Cette dangereuse hérésie fut dénoncée au sein de nombreux systèmes, mais les persécutions ne firent qu'endurcir et multiplier ses adeptes.
languages.original_text: Rumours and stories of {mf|his|her} humanitarian rule formed the foundation of the Valancean school of philosophy. The sect united commoners and aristocrats in the belief that for the Imperium to flourish, it should stop seeing its subjects as mere tools. This dangerous heresy was denounced in many systems, but persecutions only hardened and multiplied its followers.

traits.locale_text: Les rumeurs et les histoires concernant son règne humaniste donnèrent naissance à l'école valancéenne de philosophie. La secte unit roturiers et aristocrates, tous convaincus que la prospérité de l'Imperium reposait sur une vision moins utilitaire de ses sujets. Cette dangereuse hérésie fut dénoncée au sein de nombreux systèmes, mais les persécutions ne firent qu'endurcir et multiplier ses adeptes.

languages.text: Los rumores e historias de su gobierno humanitario sentaron los cimientos de la corriente filosófica valanciana. Esta secta unió a los plebeyos y a los aristócratas en la creencia de que, para que el Imperium florezca, debe dejar de tratar a sus súbditos como meras herramientas. Esta peligrosa herejía se censuró en muchos sistemas, pero las persecuciones solo reforzaron y multiplicaron a sus seguidores.
languages.original_text: Rumours and stories of {mf|his|her} humanitarian rule formed the foundation of the Valancean school of philosophy. The sect united commoners and aristocrats in the belief that for the Imperium to flourish, it should stop seeing its subjects as mere tools. This dangerous heresy was denounced in many systems, but persecutions only hardened and multiplied its followers.

traits.locale_text: Los rumores e historias de su gobierno humanitario sentaron los cimientos de la corriente filosófica valanciana. Esta secta unió a los plebeyos y a los aristócratas en la creencia de que, para que el Imperium florezca, debe dejar de tratar a sus súbditos como meras herramientas. Esta peligrosa herejía se censuró en muchos sistemas, pero las persecuciones solo reforzaron y multiplicaron a sus seguidores.

languages.text: {mf|彼|彼女}の人道的な支配に関する噂や話は、ヴァランシウス学派の哲学の基礎となった。この学派は、帝国が繁栄するためには、臣民を単なる道具と見なすのをやめるべきだという信念のもとに、平民と貴族を団結させた。この危険な異端は多くの体制で糾弾されたが、迫害は信者を硬直化させ、増加させるばかりだった。
languages.original_text: Rumours and stories of {mf|his|her} humanitarian rule formed the foundation of the Valancean school of philosophy. The sect united commoners and aristocrats in the belief that for the Imperium to flourish, it should stop seeing its subjects as mere tools. This dangerous heresy was denounced in many systems, but persecutions only hardened and multiplied its followers.

traits.locale_text: {mf|彼|彼女}の人道的な支配に関する噂や話は、ヴァランシウス学派の哲学の基礎となった。この学派は、帝国が繁栄するためには、臣民を単なる道具と見なすのをやめるべきだという信念のもとに、平民と貴族を団結させた。この危険な異端は多くの体制で糾弾されたが、迫害は信者を硬直化させ、増加させるばかりだった。

languages.text: İnsani hükümdarlığı hakkındaki söylentiler ve hikâyeler, Valancius felsefe akımının temellerini attı. İmparatorluk'un, büyüyüp serpilmek istiyorsa tebaasını birer araç olarak görmeyi bırakması gerektiğine inanan akım, sıradan yurttaşlar ile aristokratları bir araya getirdi. Tehlikeli bir kâfirlik olarak addedilen akım, birçok sistemde itibar görmezken çektikleri zulümle güçlenip takipçi sayısını artırdı.
languages.original_text: Rumours and stories of {mf|his|her} humanitarian rule formed the foundation of the Valancean school of philosophy. The sect united commoners and aristocrats in the belief that for the Imperium to flourish, it should stop seeing its subjects as mere tools. This dangerous heresy was denounced in many systems, but persecutions only hardened and multiplied its followers.

traits.locale_text: İnsancıl hükümdarlığı hakkındaki söylentiler ve hikâyeler, Valancius felsefe akımının temellerini attı. İmparatorluk'un, büyüyüp serpilmek istiyorsa tebaalarını birer araç olarak görmeyi bırakması gerektiğine inanan akım, sıradan halkı da, aristokratları da bir araya getirdi. Birçok sistemde tehlikeli bir kâfirlik olarak addedilerek itibar görmedi ancak gördükleri zulüm onları güçlendirdi ve takipçi sayılarını artırdı.
